## MenuItemRole variable

Menu items roles.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
MenuItemRole: {
    readonly menuitem: "menuitem";
    readonly menuitemcheckbox: "menuitemcheckbox";
    readonly menuitemradio: "menuitemradio";
}
```
